activities: MoPub, Inc. receives and processes personal information from end users of mobile applications and websites that utilize MoPub’s advertising technology services within the EU/EEA and Switzerland. MoPub, Inc. receives and processes personal information relating to natural persons in the EU/EEA and Switzerland who are individual contacts of corporate customers (including advertisers and publishers of mobile applications and websites), suppliers, service providers and other corporate business partners of MoPub, Inc. The personal information described above is collected, held and processed for different purposes, which may include any of the following: serving ads, ad reporting and conversions, frequency capping, fraud detection and prevention, interest-based advertising, geo-targeting, and providing and improving our services
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline customer data which may be manually processed
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner pursuant to the Safe Harbor certification.
